title: How long would it take to listen to every BTS song ever? - Quora

response.answer_text: Okay, actually, I had to do my research for this question, so thank me later. I compiled every remix and original songs as well as covers and any other content created by BTS and looked at the time addition my Spotify account does for me. The total ended up being over 300 songs to listen to with about 23 hours of music. So basically, you can stream every single BTS song ever made successfully everyday. Now there are no excuses to not be streaming everyday 😎 ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ Borahae! 💜

They have many songs from 2013 till now which includes cover songs and collabs. Hmmm a Hell of a long Time but worth the minutes spent. Some are hard core Rap others are sad some sound tracks from their games which have a movie intro or outro feel to it. Then there are the dance pop songs and everthing else in between. Pick an era and enjoy. Ku, Meili Kpop Hit Tv
